## InvocationContext.assertMethodExists() method

Assert the method exists on the target. An error will be thrown if otherwise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
assertMethodExists(): Record<string, Function>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Record<string, Function>`
